multiplechoiceresponse.label: According to the text, what is the primary purpose of DB-VAE mathematics?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To approximate the latent space of data points through a joint histogram.
To generate new data points from a given latent space.
To reduce the dimensionality of data points.
To improve the accuracy of neural networks.
